trans-unit.source: Represents the type information for a custom <xref href="System.Net.IWebProxy"></xref> module.

This class corresponds to the `type` attribute of the [\<module\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/module-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
This class is used to specify a Web proxy that handles requests made with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes.
This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ModuleElement"></xref> class.

This constructor adds a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty> object for the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ModuleElement.Type%2A> property to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.Properties%2A> collection.
Gets or sets the type and assembly information for the current instance.
This property contains the fully qualified type name followed by a comma (,) and the assembly information.
The elements of the assembly information are separated with commas, for example, `Corp.Net.CustomWebProxy, CorpLibrary, Version=1.0.5000.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken="00000000000000000"`.
A string that identifies a type that implements the <xref href="System.Net.IWebProxy"></xref> interface or `null` if no value has been specified.
